name: Entrance Hall
description: A large room with a portrait on the wall
long_description: You are standing in the entrance hall of a small cabin. There is a portrait on the wall which depicts a noble looking elderly man. The grim expression on his face spells trouble. There are doors to the north and east. A staircase leads to the upper floor. The entrance to the cabin is to the south, but you have no reason to leave: you must find the amulet.

name: Sitting Room
description: A room with comfortable chairs around a fireplace
long_description: Comfortable-looking chairs rest facing a fireplace in this sitting room. A large window looks out onto the forest behind the cabin. There are doors to the north, south and east.

name: Kitchen
description: A room with a large stove and pots and pans
long_description: The center of this kitchen features a large wood-burning stove, pots and pans hang securely above it. Counter tops and cabinets line the walls, and a pantry can be seen to one side. A large window looks out onto the lake to the east. There are doors to the west and north.

name: Dining Room
description: A room with a long table and chairs
long_description: A long oak table stretches across the middle of this dining room. sturdy-looking chairs line its sides with a larger ornate chair at the far head. There are doors to the south and west.

name: Upstairs Hallway
description: A cramped hallway with a chest on the far end
long_description: This hallway is rather dark, with a single window at the far end. A chest sits against the wall underneath it, and there are doors to the east and west. A staircase leads down to the entrance hall.

name: Study
description: A room with a large desk and leather armchair
long_description: The study is a quiet retreat, dominated by a large oak desk piled high with papers and books. A leather armchair sits nearby, its well-worn cushions inviting you to sit and contemplate. A small bookshelf appears to contain some personal journals. A door to the west leads back to the hallway.

name: Bedroom
description: A cozy room with a large bed
long_description: A small bed sits squarely against the far wall of this bedroom. A nightstand sits beside it, and a wardrobe stands against the wall. A door to the east leads back to the hallway.

name: Library
description: A cozy library with chairs and lots of books
long_description: The library is a cozy room with several comfortable chairs. Bookshelves line the walls, filled with volumes on a variety of subjects. A door to the south leads back to the sitting room.

name: Cellar
description: A wine cellar underneath the cabin
long_description: The cellar is dark and musty, with a few cobwebs in the corners. Shelves line the walls, filled with bottles of wine and other supplies. A staircase to the north leads back to the kitchen.

name: Secret Room
description: A hidden room behind a wine rack
long_description: This room is hidden behind a wine rack in the cellar. It is small and cramped, with a single stone table in the center. A small box sits on top of it. A door to the east leads back to the cellar.
